alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued November 25 at 3:18AM PST until November 26 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Damage to outdoor plumbing possible. Expect damage to crops or sensitive vegetation, and harm to unprotected pets or livestock.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
